author: Mawich
title: Useful building space...
review: I had four of these in my original town, one on each corner of a 4 plate by 4 plate layout.  The great advantage these plates had over the other three were the building space provided in one corner.   I was able to comfortably fit 6363 (Auto Repair Shop) with its unique L shape into that corner, something not possible with any of the other road plates designs.

author: go4bob
title: The extra width does it
review: This set as with all the other vintage road plates like 300 302 and the cross intersection are just the right width for the modern highway construction set of 6600 in the year 2000 to clip on and continue the roads in either direction, all other road plates don't have the studs as the roads have been widened for bikes and drains in the latest road plates. a classic road plate for everyones collection.
